attributes.action: Ban imports of Russian oil and gas from the UK…
attributes.additional_details: We cannot in good conscience continue to pay Russia for energy when we know it will use this revenue to perpetrate warfare on Ukraine
attributes.background: UK Gov should ban imports of all Russian Oil and Gas products immediately

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Place the strictest possible sanctions on Russia until it withdraws from Ukraine: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/609428

Full embargo of Russian imports in lieu of active military support in Ukraine: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/609457
